item.description:
This workshop meet up will be led by Sandy Kulman who is the director of the Birch Bay (WAshington) Meditation Center. It will include discussion, meditation, and Q & A and veggie snacks.

Also on Saturday, she will lead a free retreat on Improving Relationships through Meditation in Storrs at the Friends Meeting House from 10AM to 2pm.
Everyone is invited. It will include workshop, meditation, Q&A, vegetarian lunch. PLease RSVP if you plan to come to this one. For more information, 860 487-3597.
item.name: Releasing Anger Through Meditation
